data.title: Most Delicious Signature Pasta!
data.text: Stopped in here on a DTLA food tour and it was one of my favorite stops on the tour. We sampled the chicken salad & a PB smoothie, but my favorite by far was their signature pasta. It was delicious! This was a pleasant surprise, considering I had them pegged for a typical cold lunch (soup/sandwich) type of place. I would have ordered more if it wasn't the first stop on our tour! I will definitely be going back when I'm in the area!

owner_response.author: Rachel's K, RK Founder at Rachel's Kitchen, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi Maya, 
   Happy to hear you discovered Rachel's Kitchen on the food tour! Our Signature Pasta is a favorite among many Rachel's Kitchen regular guests. We look forward to seeing you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Breakfast or Brunch Spot! Amazing smoothies!
data.text: From a tourist's perspective, Rachel's Kitchen is a small chain that might go unnoticed, but is a must-stop place.  There are multiple locations including the LAS airport.

owner_response.author: Rachel's K, RK Founder at Rachel's Kitchen, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello BSOD, 
   Happy to hear you found us and wrote a review recommending to others on Trip Advisor to check out Rachel's Kitchen. We appreciate your kind words about our Breakfast, we serve Breakfast all day. We hope to see you again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Wonderful brunch
data.text: We had brunch with several friends.  Everyone ordered something different and we were all full and happy.

data.title: Delicious
data.text: Quaint eatery with food that will blow you away! Unique but tasty smoothies, chicken salad and pastas..yum, yum!

data.title: Breakfast Burrito Bomb
data.text: A bit pricy for what is served.  Although the smoothies were great!! Pricey but very good.  Don't waste your time on the breakfast burrito - very bland.  The hamburger was awesome

owner_response.author: Rachel's K, RK Founder at Rachel's Kitchen, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi Shauna, 
   Thanks for your review, we appreciate your feedback. Happy to hear you enjoyed your Smoothie and Hamburger. We hope to see you again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great for a nice quiet lunch with the kids!
data.text:
We stopped here as part of a food tour.  We sampled the chicken pasta and chicken salad and it was wonderful.... So I went back the following day for lunch!

My kids loved the homemade muffins as well.  We just needed a change from all the franchise restaurants and hotel buffets.

This place hit the spot.

owner_response.author: RKHualapai, RK Founder at Rachel's Kitchen, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi Wendy, 
    Thanks for your review. What a great compliment, stopping in on a food tour and then coming back with your family! Glad you enjoyed your lunch. We hope to see you again soon on your next visit to Las Vegas!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Another brand with unhealthy food
data.text:
We went to RK in order to get some healthy food on an average price. 
We got Smoothies with tons of sugar, Oat with one strawberry and a few pieces banana. Everything served on plastic. 
The windows were terrible dirty and the music was much to loud. 
Overall it was disapointing. We won't go there again.

owner_response.author: Rachel's K, RK Founder at Rachel's Kitchen, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi otbest, 
   Thanks for your review we appreciate your feedback. We offer something for everyone's palette, whether you are watching what you eat or wanting to indulge. We apologize for the windows. We have followed up with our team members on your comments.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Breakfast at Rachel's
data.text: Was only customer and started to order off their menu only to be told wait I need some help(?) Food was delicious and lots of it. Kind of unusual set up. You order then pour your coffee then food is brought to you at your table..

owner_response.author: RKHualapai, RK Founder at Rachel's Kitchen, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello David R., 
  Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We will share your comments with our team members. Glad you enjoyed your food. We hope to see you again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: The thing I miss most about working down town!!!!!
data.text: Great menu, helpful staff and delivers. Can't beat the prices and the quality of food.... plus you can grab a beer at the same time.

owner_response.author: Rachel's K, RK Founder at Rachel's Kitchen, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi FADYNOT@HOTTIE, 
  Thanks for your review. Happy to hear you like our food and service. If you are no longer working downtown, look for one of our other neighborhood locations on our website. Hope to see you again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Amazing breakfast
data.text: Every morning I was walking a few hundreds meters from my hotel for amazing breakfast, delicious prepared smoothies and free wifi. Fresh food, friendly staff and lovely coffee.

owner_response.author: Rachel's K, RK Founder at Rachel's Kitchen, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi Lukasz, 
   Thanks for your review. We appreciate you stopping in for Breakfast. Thanks for the compliments on our food, service and atmosphere. Glad you enjoyed your coffee too. 
We hope to see you again on your next visit to Las Vegas.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Sweetest little spot to grab a healthy meal
data.text: My wife and I had my son with us and decided to just ride around and look for lunch. We initially were going to Mimi's in the same vicinity, but it was far too busy for us to wait with a toddler. Once entering the restaurant we were please with the friendly atmosphere and the wide selection of healthy choice we had to choose from. Everything was wonderful, the sandwiches, soup, smoothies and desserts were amazing. We plan on making Rachel's apart of our regular dining places.

owner_response.author: RKHualapai, RK Founder at Rachel's Kitchen, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello, 
   Glad you found us. Happy to hear your family enjoyed our menu selections and atmosphere. Glad you are making us a go to dining place. We look forward to seeing you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: We need more Rachel's!
data.text: Visited as a part of Vegas Valley Food Tour. What a delight. Just off of Fremont Street, I could have eaten here morning- noon- and night if it weren't for all of the other great places to eat too. Short story- I need a Rachel's in my town.

owner_response.author: RKHualapai, RK Founder at Rachel's Kitchen, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi Megan, 
   Glad you joined us on the Vegas Valley Food Tour. Happy to hear you enjoyed our food. We look forward to seeing you on your next visit. Safe travels home.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Sandwiches, Smoothies, Salads + more
data.text:
I've been here two times during my two week stay in Vegas. Rachel's has a fantastic menu that features breakfast food, sandwiches, wraps, salads, pasta, smoothies, pastries, juices, coffee, and bottled beer. 

On my first trip, I've tried the 440 Sandwich (w/ side salad) and The Peachberry smoothie. The 440 sandwich (grilled chicken w/ goat cheese and tomato) instantly became my favorite. The smoothies were fantastic and better than anything you'd get from a chain smoothie shop. 

On trip two, I enjoyed the Protein Breakfast (in the afternoon) of three eggs w/ diced chicken, spinach, and turkey bacon. On the side was breakfast potatoes, wheat toast and I washed it down with a Wilshire smoothie. Aside from the food, I can speak of the friendly staff who provided recommendations and great service. They also did a hell of a job keeping the bums away from the restaurant by calling security as soon as one tried hanging out at the outdoor seating.

owner_response.author: RKHualapai, RK Founder at Rachel's Kitchen, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello dz_ad27, 
   Thanks for your review and sharing your experience for others on Trip Advisor. Glad you enjoyed your food on your first visit and came back again. We appreciate your kind words about our service and will pass them along to our team members. We hope to see you again on your next visit to Las Vegas.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great breakfast spot.
data.text: Healthy, well made, and tasty food in Vegas. It's reasonably priced and the staff was friendly. Lots of organic vegetables to customize your order and good coffee too.

owner_response.author: RKHualapai, RK Founder at Rachel's Kitchen, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi Tommy, 
   Thanks for checking out Rachel's Kitchen and writing a review. Happy to hear you enjoyed your meal and our coffee.. We wish you safe travels home and hope to see you again on your next visit to Las Vegas.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Watermelon Juice
data.text: I went for a refreshing juice. I decided on fresh watermelon it was so yummy juice with tiny bits of foamy watermelon. So good

owner_response.text:
Hello LoveSoCal2015,

data.title: Locally Owned Small LV Cafe with More Than One Location
data.text: Found this location just off Fremont Street as part of Vegas Valley Downtown Tours which I highly recommend you do.  On the tour we were served a peanut butter smoothie which was very good but rich.  We returned later and it was difficult what to choose for breakfast.  We went with fresh fruit and pancakes and bacon.  All of it was very tasty but I really liked the bacon and the fruit the best.  You order at the window and then they bring your meal to you.  The service was friendly and fast and the restaurant is clean and bright with nice art on the walls.

owner_response.author: RKHualapai, RK Founder at Rachel's Kitchen, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi Jean, 
  Thank you for your review and letting others know about your experience Happy to hear you enjoyed the food, service and atmosphere. We hope to see you again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: great breakfast
data.text: we loved our breakfast here! too bad it was closed when we tried to go back for a second time on a Saturday. The pancakes were delicious, good coffee and great acai bowl.

data.text: On a tour of old Las Vegas and it stopped here. Very clean very bright. The chicken salad was excellent. The penne was super.

data.title: Excellent wholesome food
data.text: You tell the food here is fresh and organic, and the portion sizes are proper so you feel energized after eating  meal here.  The prices are reasonable, and I can recommend this place to anyone who wants a tasty and healthy meal.
